Summary: driving on the 525 and look to see object. clearly and close
divs: sighting detailsdriving to hocky game w\ friend in charleston sc on the 525.look to my left see ufo, half mile away about 500 ft in air.... passing me ,i said,'wtf', my friend says just dont know never seen anything like that, i agreed. it sped up, as did i. i was going about 90, it was bout 200...it gets about a mile ahead, crosses parkway sharp 90degree turn, or it looked it, then behind blds on right now. when we cleared the blds , it was now just a speck, then...up and gone. my friend says milatary.......i do not know. it was fat disc w\ top and bottom peices....pill box looking....terrats looking .......also,white and red lights, teather or pole w\ red light at the end lowers from belly then goes back up.....clear day close up about the size of.....hard to say, maby a 6000 sq ft. patio home. the object did not appear to be spinning.................. we were both amazed , but my friend quickly dismissed the sighting and does'nt care to talk about. only because he just dosent care. if it dosent make him money, what good is it, that type of guy. at the hokey game i told the friends we met there, and my witness friend tells me to shut up. hes is very funny though, and a great friend. he also dose'nt want to be "the ufo guy". i dont care. i saw what i saw. but we (usa) are making huge leaps, and who knows what we really have.
